bibliographic-data.invention-title: Trade Matching Platform with Variable Pricing Based on Clearing Relationships

nplcit.text: Kuprianov, Anatoli: Money Market Futures, 1998, Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond, VA, pages 188-217
Creditrisk.com: Trading/ Trade Confirmation/ Clearing/ Settlement/ Payments/ Custody, 2011, pages 1-15

abstract.p: The disclosure describes a regulated trading platform capable of communicating with a plurality of clearing houses. In particular, aspects of the disclosure relate to submitting enhanced request for quotes (RFQs) to request quote data with differentiated prices quotes for the same or underlying financial product/instrument based on the different clearing houses at which it may be cleared. The trading platform may allow anonymous counterparties in a multi-clearinghouse environment, and with full transparency and improved liquidity. The trading platform may also allow for non-anonymous counterparties in some situations.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: TRADE MATCHING PLATFORM WITH VARIABLE PRICING BASED ON CLEARING RELATIONSHIPS
Trade Matching Platform with Variable Pricing Based on Clearing Relationships

abstract.p: The disclosure describes a regulated trading platform capable of communicating with a plurality of clearing houses. In particular, aspects of the disclosure relate to providing and/or calculating differentiated prices for the same or underlying financial product/instrument capable of being cleared at different clearing houses. The trading platform may allow anonymous counterparties in a multi-clearinghouse environment, and with full transparency and improved liquidity. The trading platform may also allow for non-anonymous counterparties in some situations.

Chicago Board of Trade: How the e-cbot Market Works, 2003, pages 1-29

abstract.p: The disclosure describes systems and methods for using enhanced RFQs and incoming enhanced orders to assist in detecting implied orders using an implied spread determination module. In one example, a system includes a processor and memory storing a search list and computer-executable instructions, where the instructions determine whether the financial instrument associated with an eRFQ or new enhanced order is on the search list, and then determine if an implied order exists in combination with that financial instrument and CCP attribute designations. In some embodiments, a timer may be used to track a predetermined amount of time to spend towards determining if implied orders exist for a particular financial instrument at particular clearing houses.

abstract.p: The disclosure describes systems and methods for using enhanced RFQs and incoming enhanced orders to assist in detecting implied orders using an implied spread determination module. In one example, a system includes a processor and memory storing a search list and computer-executable instructions, where the instructions determine whether the financial instrument associated with an eRFQ or new enhanced order is on the search list, and then determine if an implied order exists in combination with that financial instrument and CCP attribute designations. In some embodiments, a timer may be used to track a predetermined amount of time to spend towards determining if implied orders exist for a particular financial instrument at particular clearing houses.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Trade Matching Platform with Variable Pricing Based on Clearing Relationships

abstract.p: Systems and methods are described relating to swap execution facilities (SEFs), such as additional new order/spread types for use with SEFs and clearing houses (CHs). Some new order/spread types include covered calls based on clearing house (CH)
stop orders with option to get out or specify CH
UDS with or without with designation for specific CH or generic
cancel all within a CH or aggregated or risk based
FX Spot and TomNext(TM) and related spreads
stop button by CH, exchange, or both
and other types of orders that may be modified to incorporate a CCP attribute.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Trade Matching Platform with Variable Pricing Based on Clearing Relationships

bibliographic-data.invention-title: TRADE MATCHING PLATFORM WITH VARIABLE PRICING BASED ON CLEARING RELATIONSHIPS
PLATEFORME DE MISE EN CORRESPONDANCE D'ÉCHANGES COMPRENANT UN ÉTABLISSEMENT DE PRIX VARIABLE SUR LA BASE DE RELATIONS DE COMPENSATION

abstract.p: The disclosure describes a regulated trading platform capable of communicating with a plurality of clearing houses. In particular, aspects of the disclosure relate to providing and/or calculating differentiated prices for the same or underlying financial product/instrument capable of being cleared at different clearing houses. The trading platform may allow anonymous counterparties in a multi-clearinghouse environment, and with full transparency and improved liquidity. The trading platform may also allow for non-anonymous counterparties in some situations.

L'invention porte sur une plateforme de négociation régulée apte à communiquer avec une pluralité de chambres de compensation. En particulier, des aspects de l'invention portent sur la fourniture et/ou le calcul de prix différenciés pour le même produit/instrument financier ou un produit/instrument financier sous-jacent apte à être compensé au niveau de différentes chambres de compensation. La plateforme de négociation peut permettre des contreparties anonymes dans un environnement à chambres de compensation multiples, tout en présentant une transparence complète et une liquidité améliorée. La plateforme de négociation peut également permettre des contreparties non anonymes dans certaines situations.
